# Q005 Grammar Exercise
^question Q005
^type inline_choice
^identifier IC_Q001
^title Grammar Exercise
^points 2
^labels #English #Grammar #Apply #Easy

@field: question_text
Complete the sentence with the correct words:

The cat {{dropdown_1}} on the mat and {{dropdown_2}} asleep.
@end_field

@field: dropdown_1
^Shuffle Yes
- sat*
- sit
- sitting
@end_field

@field: dropdown_2
^Shuffle Yes
- fell*
- fall
- fallen
@end_field

@field: scoring
^Points_per_correct_field 1
^Points_each_wrong 0
^Points_minimum 0
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
The correct form uses past tense: "sat" and "fell".
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback
Correct! "sat" and "fell" are the right choices.
@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback
Incorrect. Review past tense verb forms.
@@end_field

@@field: partial_feedback
Partially correct.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please select an option from each dropdown.
@@end_field

@end_field
